title: Oath Keepers Leader Testifies at Jan. 6 Sedition Trial
description: Stewart Rhodes, the founder of the far-right militia group, took the stand in his own defense in Federal District Court in Washington.
dc:creator: Alan Feuer and Zach Montague
media:description: Stewart Rhodes, the leader of the Oath Keepers militia, in 2016. He sought to defend himself against sedition charges when he took the witness stand on Friday.
